text:
[Verse]
Umbrella in my hand
Sky dark but we're so grand
Splash the puddles feel the beat
Nothing stops us on this street

[Verse 2]
Rhythm in the rain
Time to break the chain
Laughs mix with the storm
In the cold we're warm

[Chorus]
Dancing in the rain
No more tears
No more pain
Every drop a chance to play
Make it bright on a gray day

[Verse 3]
No need for dry land
Trace steps in the sand
Dreams are pouring down
We won't let them drown

[Bridge]
Feet soaked
Hearts light
We shine in the night
Raincoat
No coat
Doesn't matter
Our joy getting even madder

[Chorus]
Dancing in the rain
No more tears
No more pain
Every drop a chance to play
Make it bright on a gray day
title: Dancing in the Rain
